author: Ryan Gaydos
title: The Open Championship will allow LIV Golf competitors, organizer says - Fox News
description: The Open Championship, the last major of the golf season, will feature LIV Golf competitors, the organizer of the tournament said Wednesday.
content:
LIV Golf competitors will be able to play in The Open Championship next month, the organizers for the last major of the season said Wednesday.
